description: ClusterResourceQuotaStatus defines the actual enforced quota and its current usage

total.description: Total defines the actual enforced quota and its current usage across all projects

namespaces.description: Namespaces slices the usage by project.  This division allows for quick resolution of deletion reconciliation inside of a single project without requiring a recalculation across all projects.  This can be used to pull the deltas for a given project.
